description:
Light, bright, and easy to mount just about anywhere. With flood, focused, and red light, the Capon 40B has a mode for your situation, be it working under the sink, or collecting wood for the campfire. Rechargeable by USB, gone are the days of “good enough” batteries. A rotatable clip lets you clip this light on the brim of your hat or a pack strap for headlamp-like lighting, without a headlamp strap.

  • 3 types of lighting, flood light – spreads light up to 180°, focused spotlight, and red spotlight
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: white light 16-230 lumens, red light 1-20 lumens
  • Red lighting mode saves your night vison and is less likely to disturb tentmates on those early starts
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • IP54 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Rotatable and tilting clip gives you mounting options
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 90 minutes
  • Dimensions: 3.7 x 5.4 2.4cm
  • In the box: Capon 40B, carabiner, storage pouch, USB-C charging cable
name: Claymore Capon 40B Cap Light
